title: LLaMA 2 Training
description: Trained LLaMA on custom data for question and answer generation.

title: Orbify
description: Translates Integrify JSON forms into the XForms source code used in Orbeon Form Builder 2021 PE. There is also a branch available for the old 2019 PE version of Orbeon.

title: Cartesian Problems
description: A Java application for visualizing and comparing algorithms on a Cartesian Plane. I visualize how Graham Scan and Jarvis March construct a convex hull. I also compare a brute force method and a 2-factor approximation for minimum vertex cover.

title: UnitPlayground
description: An interactive interface for experimentation with units and their relationships.

title: Go Fish Extension
description: A firefox extension that allows up to four users to play against each other or against various AI. The two available AI players are based on logical rules and monte-carlo search trees respectively.
